rooms.description: A welcoming space with ample natural light. The entrance faces north as per Vastu principles.
Spacious two-car garage with proper ventilation and storage solutions.
Modern living room designed for family interaction, with south-west windows to balance energy flow.
Integrated dining area near the kitchen for social gatherings. Placement ensures ease of movement and natural lighting.
Well-ventilated kitchen with east or north exposure to ensure positive energy flow per Vastu guidelines.
Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony facing north to promote calmness. Ample closet space included.
Cozy guest room designed for visitors, optimally positioned in the east zone to ensure positive energy.
Functional bathroom adjacent to both master and guest bedrooms. North-east placement recommended.

openings.description: Main entrance door ensuring natural light and a positive flow of energy.
Windows placed strategically to allow maximum ventilation while respecting privacy and security norms.

other_features.description: A modern swimming pool designed for leisure and exercise. Positioned to complement overall design aesthetics.
A balcony area offering a scenic view and relaxation space. Aligned with Vastu for family harmony.
Lush garden area promoting natural ambiance and a connection with nature.

rooms.description: En-suite master bedroom with a private balcony. Positioned in the north to enhance privacy and calm energy.
Additional storage area integrated within the first floor for ease of access.

openings.description: Provides direct access from the master bedroom to the outdoor balcony area.
Natural light openings integrated in each room for a well-lit space.

other_features.description: Modern staircase with safety handrails connecting ground and first floor.
